channel.title: golang on Outsource the problem
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Outsource the problem

item.title: Optional types in Go in done right
item.description: Suppose you have a problem: you’ve got relatively small go codebase (10 kloc without tests) to support & develop at your job. You started to add new features, writing tests, deploying it to production on daily basis, and… It keeps crashing.
